content.description: Which of the following correctly indicates the direction of the electric field at Point <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi> </math> and provides a valid justification?
content.question: Direction Justification A The electric field is directed perpendicular to the equipotential lines and toward decreasing electric potential. B The electric field is in the same direction as the electric force exerted on a negatively charged object. C The electric field is directed perpendicular to the equipotential lines and toward increasing electric potential. D The electric field is in the same direction as the electric force exerted on a positively charged object.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
